ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] hello
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Donna! I pre-ordered Lost Dungeons and so far nothing unusual has happened to me. *knock on woodelf* I thought about cancelling and buying the CD but it
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Donna!
I pre-ordered Lost Dungeons and so far nothing unusual has happened to me.
*knock on woodelf*
I thought about cancelling and buying the CD but it would just be one more
thing to worry about from the post office.
I like the idea of it being $5 cheaper to buy the online version.
luv,
-Su

>Hiya,
>I just wanted to introduce myself.
>My name is Donna. I play a 56 warrior on Bristlebane.
>
>Be careful if your thinking of ordering Lost Dungeons of Norrath. Theres
all kinds of problems with it. A fellow Guildie pre >ordered it and last
night when he got killed he deleveled 7 levels. Here's a link to the kind of
problems everyone is having.
>
>http://forum.magecompendium.com/tower/viewtopic.php?t=6050
>
>I'm looking forward to meeting everyone.
>donna


So.. Anyone pre-order Lost Dungeons of Norrath? And is anyone going to
wait
to buy the storebought CD version that comes with a real life gift as well
as an in-game gift of an 8 slot weight reduction bag for one character?
luv,
-Su
